kDesc
Life is tough on the rim but that's where all the action is. Best to keep quiet and carry a big gun. [#Legal]
La vie est dure à la frontière, mais c'est là qu'il ya l'action. Il faut mieux garder le silence et porte une grande arme. [#Legal]
Das Leben am Rand ist hart, doch es ist immer was los. Man sollte sich bedeckt halten und eine große Knarre dabei haben. [#Legal]
La vita al forte è dura, ma è il prezzo da pagare per una vita piena di azione. Meglio fare silenzio e avere un'arma potente. [#Legal]
La vida en la frontera es dura, pero ahí es donde está la acción. Lo mejor es no armar mucho revuelo y llevar una buena arma. [#Legal]
Life is tough on the rim but that's where all the action is. Best to keep quiet and carry a big gun. [#Legal]
Life is tough on the rim but that's where all the action is. Best to keep quiet and carry a big gun. [#Legal]
Life is tough on the rim but that's where all the action is. Best to keep quiet and carry a big gun. [#Legal]
